dry-clean-permanent-press: dry clean, fabric is permanent press
dry-clean-petroleum-solvent-delicate: dry clean, petroleum solvents only, gentle/delicate setting
dry-clean-petroleum-solvent-permanent-pr: dry clean, petroleum solvents only, fabric is permanent press
dry-clean-reduced-moisture: dry clean, requires less moisture than normal
dry-flat-dry-in-shade: lay out flat to dry, in shade
high-heat-tumble-dry: tumble dry on high heat setting (~65℃/150℉)
iron-at-110: ironing ok on low heat setting (~110℃/230℉)
iron-at-150: ironing ok on medium heat setting (~150℃/300℉)
iron-at-200: ironing ok on high heat setting (~200℃/400℉)
low-heat-tumble-dry: tumble dry on high heat setting (~50℃/125℉)
machine-wash-gentle-or-delicate: machine wash allowed, use gentle/delicate setting
machine-wash-permanent-press: machine wash allowed, fabric is permanent press
medium-heat-tumble-dry: tumble dry on high heat setting (~58℃/135℉)
tumble-dry-gentle-or-delicate: tumble dry allowed, use gentle/delicate setting
tumble-dry-permanent-press: tumble dry allowed, fabric is permanent press
wash-at-or-below-20-degrees: machine wash allowed at or below 20℃/70℉
wash-at-or-below-30-degrees: machine wash allowed at or below 30℃/85℉
wash-at-or-below-40-degrees: machine wash allowed at or below 40℃/105℉
wash-at-or-below-50-degrees: machine wash allowed at or below 50℃/120℉
wash-at-or-below-60-degrees: machine wash allowed at or below 60℃/140℉
wash-at-or-below-70-degrees: machine wash allowed at or below 70℃/160℉
wash-at-or-below-90-degrees: machine wash allowed at or below 90℃/195℉
wash-at-or-below-95-degrees: machine wash allowed at or below 95℃/205℉
wet-clean-delicate: requires professional wet cleaning, gentle/delicate setting
wet-clean-permanent-press: requires professional wet cleaning, fabric is permanent press
